1.verse: The word of Jehovah which came unto Zephaniah the son of Cushi, the son of Gedaliah, the son of Amariah, the son of Hezekiah, in the days of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah.
Gather yourselves together, yea, gather together, O nation that hath no shame;
Woe to her that is rebellious and polluted! to the oppressing city!
